item.title: Alerts-X: Overview
item.description: In order to analyze useful metrics about performance, Alerts extracts, loads and stores data from all TravelgateX marketplace. Once the metrics are stored in our infrastructure, our service-alerts analyze your performance according to a configuration alert which can be created/updated or viewed using API alertsWorking with Alerts The most important use case working with Alerts is to query about your performance.
